participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Creative, sociable, and sensitive to others' opinions. Enjoys expressing himself through art and music.
participant_1.background: I started my own photography business from home so I could listen to my music while working. I build aquariums for a living. I love going to concerts on the weekend. When people do not like my social media posts, it upsets me. I like to cook and eat Italian food on my own.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Reflective, family-oriented, and health-conscious. Values personal growth and enjoys a balanced lifestyle.
participant_2.background: I spend time alone to reflect on my life and what I want to achieve. I read everything I could about my family history. I love bananas because they are a quick and easy snack that can give me a boost of energy during my long runs. I used to work for Monsanto. I drive a four wheel drive vehicle.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
Hey I am doing great! I just finished my run and I am feeling very energized.
Oh that's great! I love running but I need to get back into the habit of doing it. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read and spend time with my family. I also like to go on long walks in the park.
That sounds really nice. I love to go to the park too. I also like to take pictures and play guitar.
Oh that's awesome! I love photography too. I used to work for Monsanto as a photographer.
That's so cool! What kind of photography did you do?
I mostly did product photography for their website.
It was a lot of fun but I decided to change careers and become a personal trainer.
That's great! I'm sure you're a great personal trainer.
Thank you! I'm really enjoying it so far.
I'm sure you are. You seem like a really nice person.
Thank you! That's very kind of you to say.
You're welcome! It was great talking to you.
You too! It was nice to meet you.
